titles.title: Lock Out Child Crime Act of 1994
To amend title 18, United States Code, to federalize the crime of child molestation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E965)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 5/18/1994--Introduced. Lock Out Child Crime Act of 1994 - Amends the Federal criminal code to set penalties for engaging in child molestation where the victim is five years or more younger than the perpetrator.
